title: Human Dimension Cybersec
description: This course will illuminate the human dimension of cybersecurity, and explore the attitudes, behaviors and perceptions associated with different stakeholders in cybersecurity.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1315 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
